name: 狂信ちゃん
description:
A multi-ending novel game depicting the story of VTuber "Toaru" fan "Hinade-chan" and player "I" going to an off-line meeting until the off-line meeting ends.
The player ``I'' went to an off-party with ``Hinade-chan'', a fan of VTuber ``Toaru'', and had a safe off-party without stimulating ``Hinade-chan,'' a girl who seems to be doing something wrong. Aim to finish.
The story is a multi-ending system that changes depending on the player's choice, and there are 5 endings.
It's up to you to decide which ending you want.
